sections.heading: Fiscal Analyst; receive copy of estimates, reports, and allocation requests
sections.text: A copy of all estimates, reports, and allocation requests required by the Deferred Building Renewal Act shall be submitted electronically to the Legislative Fiscal Analyst upon his or her request.SourceLaws 1977, LB 309, § 1

81-187.Legislative Fiscal Analyst; receive copy of estimates, reports, and allocation requests.

A copy of all estimates, reports, and allocation requests required by the Deferred Building Renewal Act shall be submitted electronically to the Legislative Fiscal Analyst upon his or her request.

SourceLaws 1977, LB 309, § 15;Laws 1985, LB 2, § 6;Laws 1998, LB 1129, § 18;Laws 2012, LB782, § 166.
